definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: murmur, whisper (NH id.; Targum Ithpe. bickbite, slander);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיֵּרָֽגְנוּ]] Ps 106:25 and they murmured in their tents, so 2 mpl. [[וַתֵּרָֽגְנוּ]] De 1:27.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נִרְגָּן]] backbiter Pr 16:28, Pr 18:8, Pr 26:20, Pr 26:22.
